value:
I shall return home to Silesse after I
defeat Raydrik. I promised as much
to Karin.

Prince Leif helped me realize what it
means to be a crusader, and what
purpose our power is meant to serve.

I cannot ignore the plight of those in
need. My sister is the sameâ€”she is
truly our mother's daughter.

Mother... I regret that I could not get
you even a glimpse of Father before...

I heard a rumor that my father was in
Munster. I traveled there as quickly as
I could, but he was already gone.

I am searching for my father. You
don't happen to know anything,
do you, $Nu?

The correct approach to war is to
save as many lives as you can. There
is no meaning in being a sole survivor.

Those who surrender without a fight
will be spared. I swear it.

Only my father could have cured my
mother's illness. Even by her side,
I could not help her...

Let us gather our strength and stand
against adversity. Only with a strong
will can we achieve our aims.

I am Ced, leader of the Magi in
Munster. Together, I believe you
and I can save many lives.

An evil cult devoted to the dark god
Loptous once ruled all of Jugdral
for several centuries.$k$pThat empire was finally overthrown
by the heroes we call the crusaders.$k$pBut simply being crusaders is not
what made them heroes. Their
heroism was in their actions.$k$pRather than meekly submit to power,
they chose to endure terrible conflict
to fight for freedom and peace.$k$pThat is what a crusader is to me: one
who leads people to victory, as Lord
Seliph and Prince Leif have done.$k$pI aspire to do the same. I only hope
my mother is watching over us.
I will hold fast to hope.
O wind...
To cast off all chains!
Guide me.
I go no further...
I am Ced of the Magi. Do not think me a hero.
Was that you? I thought I was touched by the breeze.
What does it mean to be a crusader? I feel that Prince Leif embodies the very idea.
To inherit a divine weapon does not make one a crusader. To carry on the will of the crusaders is the true measure.
The hard road Prince Leif has been forced to march has also made him strong.
So many have suffered such great loss... For their sake, I must continue on.
You are embraced by a gentle breeze.
Yes.
I await your orders.
My aid is yours.
